gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 129, Nets 128
gameRecap.excerpt: Charlotte defeats Brooklyn, 129-128. Terry Rozier led the way with 37 points (13-25 FG, 7-9 3PT), 13 assists, and four rebounds as Gordon Hayward added 22 points, six assists, and six rebounds. Cam Thomas returned from a nine game absence to score 26 points for Brooklyn as Mikal Bridges (22 points, nine rebounds, four assists) and Nic Claxton (20 points, 14 rebounds) totaled 42 points. Charlotte improves to 6-11 as Brooklyn moves to 9-9 on the year.
